Method Detail

getOptions

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player and Maker client programs. The QuizServer returns a list of Strings containing the question options.

Returns:
A List of Strings, in order from option A-E.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

selectQuiz

boolean selectQuiz(java.lang.String quizID)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player and Maker client programs. Server searches for ID of quiz to be played provided by the client.

Parameters:
quizID - - String of quiz ID to search for
Returns:
true if found, false if quiz with quizID does not exist.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getQuizNamesAndIDs

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getQuizNamesAndIDs()
                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player and Quiz Maker client programs. Prints a list of quizzes that are available to play in the format of quiz ID: quiz name

Returns:
A List of Strings, one String for each Quiz available to play.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

generateUniqueQuizID

java.lang.String generateUniqueQuizID(java.lang.String name)
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Sends quiz name String to the QuizServer for creation of a unique ID.

Parameters:
name - - String to use as a base for ID generation.
Returns:
Unique ID as a String.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addQuestion

void addQuestion(java.lang.String q)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Sends a question as a String to the QuizServer to create an instance of a Question object.

Parameters:
q - - String that is passed as a parameter when creating an instance of a Question object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addOption

void addOption(java.lang.String str)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Sends option to the QuizServer as a String to the server to add to options List in the Question object.

Parameters:
str - - String to add as a Question option.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

setCorrect

void setCorrect(char c)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Sends character to the QuizServer to set as the correct option.

Parameters:
c - - The character that represents the correct option for that Question.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

printEntireQuiz

java.util.List<java.lang.String> printEntireQuiz()
                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Each question followed by its options and the correct option are returned as Strings in List format.

Returns:
A List of Strings that can be printed sequentially.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

saveQuiz

void saveQuiz()
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. Prompts the QuizServer to add the quiz to the list and save to the XML file.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getTop10

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTop10()
                                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. A list of the top 10 high scores is returned from the QuizServer. Each String is formatted to include the player name, email address and date played.

Returns:
A List of maximum 10 Strings, one for each high score.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getWinner

java.lang.String getWinner()
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Maker client program. The top score is returned from the QuizServer. The String includes the player name, email address and date played.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

searchUser

boolean searchUser(java.lang.String name)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player client program. Searches for pre-existing player name.

Parameters:
name - - The String of the name to be searched for.
Returns:
True if user already exists, false if there is no such user.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

enterPlayerData

void enterPlayerData(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player client program. A list of Strings is returned from the client, containing the player data to be recorded.

Parameters:
list - - The list of Strings: list(0) username, list(1) name, list(2) email address.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getNumberOfQuestions

int getNumberOfQuestions()
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player client program. Server returns the number of questions available for the selected quiz.

Returns:
An int for the number of questions.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getQuestionString

java.lang.String getQuestionString(int questionNumber)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player client program. Server returns 'question' part of question in use.

Parameters:
questionNumber - - The question number (0 - 9)
Returns:
The question as a String.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

compareAnswers

int compareAnswers(char[] charArray)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Quiz Player client program. Server receives an array of chars and then calculates a score by comparing to an array of correct answer chars.

Parameters:
charArray - - An array of characters for the player's answers, in order from the first to last questions.
Returns:
The number of correct answers given.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
